Enum DateVariant

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Common.BasicTypes.Primitive.DateTime
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.ISO19115.Ed2003.dll

Specifies the date/time granularity in alignment with the ISO 19115 Date_PropertyType definitions.

public enum DateVariant
Extension Methods
ExtensionMethods.GetXmlEnumName<T>(T)
ExtensionMethods.GetXmlEnumAttributeOrName<T>(T)
ExtensionMethods.GetXmlEnumAttribute<T>(T)

Fields

DateAndTime = 3

Represents the full date and time.

FullDate = 0

Represents the full date (year, month, and day).

Year = 1

Represents only the year (gYear).

YearMonth = 2

Represents the year and month (gYearMonth).

Remarks

This enumeration distinguishes whether only the year is set (gYear), the year and month (gYearMonth), a complete date (xs:date), or both date and time (xs:dateTime).
